update.name: MiXplorer v4.7.3 (201406171)
update.log:
Notice: Please uninstall the versions prior to 4.7.0 before installing the last one, sorry!
v4.7.3: - Fixed some of Text Reader bugs. - Fixed searching inside root directories. - Added .nosearch to 'Add...' menu option which helps you to make a folder invisible to search function. - Fixed date-time for system files. - Plus some tiny changes.
v4.7.2: - Fixed and Optimized decompressing rar files. - Fixed creating folder, empty file and moving files to EncFS volume. - Fixed Export feature. - Disabled Text Reader till I fix and improve it.
v4.7.1: - Fixed Baidu login. :o - Fixed deleting local EncFS files. - Fixed FC when making thumbnails. - Sorting file list with alpha-numeric names. - And some tiny changes.
v4.7.0: - Fixed download/copy from Baidu cloud. - Added export/import all preferences and bookmarks. - Fixed saving password in server config page. - Fixed Text Reader. (still needs improvement) - Fixed drag-drop items in old Android versions. - Added custom file associations dialog. - Added refresh button to bottom bar and 'Add button' moved to top-right menu. - And some tiny changes and bug fixes.
